description:
While Luffy continues his rescue mission, Nami learns a lesson about how to turn rain into cash, and Franky wakes up in a freezing forest full of ferocious cyborg animals!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des nouvelles de l`équipage. Carnet de route de Weatheria et animaux cyborgs.
Nakama-tachi no Yukue: Weatheria Report to Cyborg Animal
The Friends` Whereabouts! The Weatheria Report and the Cyborg Animals!
仲間たちの行方 空島[ウェザリア]リポートと改造動物[サイボーグアニマル]
